actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill entitled "The Urban Development Action Grant Impaction Profile Improvement Act of 1984."

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, in determining the comparative degree of economic distress among cities eligible for urban development action grants, to allot no more than one-quarter of the total points allocated for measurement of such distress to the adjusted age of housing.

titles.title: A bill entitled "The Urban Development Action Grant Impaction Profile Improvement Act of 1984."
